i believe the client denied is my own fault, connecting at the wrong url.

@neebski there is an open pull request about trailing slashes on data dir.  please test that.  i suspect this could help.
(i'm mobile and a bit limited. i cannot search the pr for you now. sorry)

@deepdiver1975 i took your advice and tried installing the data dir in the following locations,

e:\owncloud
e:\owncloud\
e:/owncloud
e:/owncloud/
and default install with no advanced or sql connections.

still no dice; makes oc5 unusable.
please use stable5 branch from github as it contains some more fixes for windows.â
works using stable5 branch, thanks. going to install and test each app to be safe. i'll report back later.

thx much appreciated!â
